import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a Call"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/calls"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



To update an existing Call, you send a `PUT` request to the Call resource with a payload including an `update` command and additional nested `params`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["command","params"],"properties":{"command":{"type":"string","enum":["update"]},"params":{"oneOf":[{"type":"object","required":["url"],"properties":{"url":{"type":"string","example":"https://example.com/swml","description":"The URL to handle the call. This parameter allows you to specify a webhook or different route in your code containing SWML instructions for handling the call.\nEither `url` or `swml` must be included for a new call."}},"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["id"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6","description":"The id of an existing call."},"fallback_url":{"type":"string","example":"https://example.com/fallback","description":"The Fallback URL to handle the call. \nThis parameter allows you to specify a backup webhook or different route in your code containing SWML instructions for handling the call."},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["canceled","completed"],"example":"canceled","description":"Either `canceled` (to cancel a not yet connected call) or `completed` (to end a call that is in progress)."}},"title":"CallUpdateParamsBase"}],"title":"Update a call with a URL"},{"type":"object","required":["swml"],"properties":{"swml":{"type":"string","example":"{'version': '1.0.0', 'sections': { 'main': [{ 'answer': { 'max_duration': 60 }},{ 'play': { 'urls': ['silence:2', 'say:Hello from SignalWire!']}}]}}","description":"Inline SWML, passed as a string, containing SWML instructions for handling the call. Either `url` or `swml` must be included for a new call."}},"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["id"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6","description":"The id of an existing call."},"fallback_url":{"type":"string","example":"https://example.com/fallback","description":"The Fallback URL to handle the call. \nThis parameter allows you to specify a backup webhook or different route in your code containing SWML instructions for handling the call."},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["canceled","completed"],"example":"canceled","description":"Either `canceled` (to cancel a not yet connected call) or `completed` (to end a call that is in progress)."}},"title":"CallUpdateParamsBase"}],"title":"Update a call with SWML"}]}},"title":"CallUpdateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The request has succeeded.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["id","from","to","direction","status","duration","duration_ms","billable_duration","source","type","charge"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6","description":"The unique identifier of the call on SignalWire. This can be used to update the call programmatically."},"from":{"type":"string","example":"sip:from-sip@example-112233445566.sip.signalwire.com","description":"The origin number or address."},"to":{"type":"string","example":"sip:from-sip@example-112233445567.sip.signalwire.com","description":"The destination number or address."},"direction":{"type":"string","enum":["outbound-api"],"example":"outbound-api","description":"The direction of the call."},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["answered","queued","initiated","ringing","ending","ended"],"example":"queued","description":"The status of the call."},"duration":{"type":"integer","example":60,"description":"The duration of the call in seconds."},"duration_ms":{"type":"integer","example":60000,"description":"The duration of the call in milliseconds."},"billable_duration":{"type":"integer","example":60,"description":"The billable duration of the call in seconds."},"source":{"type":"string","enum":["realtime_api"],"example":"realtime_api","description":"Source of this call."},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["relay_pstn_call","relay_sip_call","relay_webrtc_call"],"example":"relay_sip_call","description":"Type of this call."},"charge":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["description","amount"],"properties":{"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description for this charge."},"amount":{"type":"integer","description":"Charged amount."}},"title":"ChargeDetails"},"description":"Details on charges associated with this call."}},"title":"CallResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Access is unauthorized.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["Unauthorized"]}}}},"404":{"description":"The server cannot find the requested resource.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["Not Found"]}}}},"422":{"description":"Client error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["errors"],"properties":{"errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["type","code","message","attribute","url"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","description":"Error type."},"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error details."},"attribute":{"type":"string","description":"Request parameter associated with this error."},"url":{"type":"string","description":"Link to developer resource for this error."}},"title":"Types.StatusCodes.StatusCode422Error"}}},"example":{"errors":[{"type":"validation_error","code":"missing_required_parameter","message":"url must be a valid http or https url","attribute":"url","url":"https://developer.signalwire.com/rest/signalwire-rest/overview/error-codes#http_url_required"}]},"title":"CallUpdate422Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
